phrs.translation: 工薪阶层, 薪水阶层, 工薪阶级, 薪水阶级

sentences.sentence: Peony cigarettes, luxurious and high-graded, at a moderate price, are very popular with the salariat (wage-owners).
sentences.translation: “牡丹”香烟，豪华高档而价格适中，深受工薪阶层人士的喜欢。

sentences.sentence: Most of the people in the world are salariat, and the millionaires are minority after all, then how can the salariat driver the luxury roadster in a short time?
sentences.translation: 世界范围内，大部分人还都是工薪阶层，能跨入富翁的人毕竟是少数，那么，作为工薪阶层如何在短时间坐上豪华跑车呢？
